org.dlw.ai.blackboard
Class Cryptographer

java.lang.Object
  org.dlw.ai.blackboard.Cryptographer

public final class Cryptographer
extends java.lang.Object

The Cryptographer class represents the host of the blackboard problem. He mediates and tends the problem until it is solved. This class provides the management logic behind the resolution of a cryptogram puzzle.

This class is not extendable and therefore not part of the API. Its use is specific to the problem domain being solved by Main.

Version:
1.0.0-RC
Author:
David L. Whitehurst
